description: This PHP script handles WAN configuration settings including DHCP release, renewal, and static IP configuration. It also manages DNS settings and validates IP addresses.

methods.name: getInfo
methods.description: Retrieves a value from the provided info array by key, returning NULL if not set.

methods.name: handleConfSuccess
methods.description: Outputs a JSON response indicating successful configuration change.

methods.name: handleConfError
methods.description: Outputs a JSON response indicating a failed configuration change.
